1.name: Standard Rules
1.description: Tiles are always sequential. The Witch is always present in competitive mode. Note: when starting Standard game with 3 players, "Groping in the Dark" variant will be used instead

2.name: Advanced Rules
2.description: A random subset of tiles used each round. The Witch may or may not be present in competitive mode

3.name: Groping in the dark
3.description: Game mode for 3 and 4 players. Two inspections per round for each player
